description: The Mystic Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Mystic Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Mystic Mountain for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Mystic Mountain
shortDescription: The Mystic Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Mystic Mountain.
